sentences.sentence: Not only will you have great music in the Secret Solstice, but you can also visit some old museums.
sentences.translation: 在这个神秘的（夏）至，你不仅可以欣赏到美妙的音乐，还可以参观一些古老的博物馆。

sentences.sentence: People often start counting "nine cold periods" starting from winter solstice.
sentences.translation: 人们通常从冬至开始计算“九个寒冷期”。

sentences.sentence: When winter solstice comes, it brings the shortest days of the year and the longest nights.
sentences.translation: 当冬至到来的时候，随之而来的是一年中最短的白昼和最长的黑夜。
